response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $11,000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a significant saving of $1,000 compared to the market value. I believe this product will greatly enhance your experience and satisfaction. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you wish to proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 11000}
